info.name: TMF672-UserRolePermission-v4.0.1
info.description:
## TMF API Reference : TMF 672 - User Roles And Permissions

This API is used to manage the user account with which the customer or staff can log-in and log-off the system and the permission for the user to enter or operate the special information.

request.description: This operation list or find Permission entities
This operation creates a Permission entity.
This operation retrieves a Permission entity. Attribute selection is enabled for all first level attributes.
This operation updates partially a Permission entity.

This operation retrieves a UserRole entity. Attribute selection is enabled for all first level attributes.
This operation updates partially a UserRole entity.
